description: The time interval when the medication must be administered. The start and end times must be expressed as dateTimes, not times relative to the dispensing time (e.g. use within 24 hours).

element.definition: The time interval when the medication must be administered. The start and end times must be expressed as dateTimes, not times relative to the dispensing time (e.g. use within 24 hours).

name: Time interval for medication administration
